Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-7592 affecting package tensorflow for versions less than 2.16.1-6
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-7592 affecting package tensorflow for versions less than 2.16.1-6. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package tensorflow is earlier than 2.16.1-6, affected by CVE-2024-7592
